content:
# I have successfully gathered 20 units of iron ore, which is now in my inventory along with the wooden chest, stone furnace, wood, coal, and stone.
# Now that I have all the necessary materials, I can set up the Stone Furnace to start smelting the iron ore into iron plates.

# The Stone Furnace will require coal as fuel to operate. I will now set the Stone Furnace to smelt the iron ore.

# Let's set the Stone Furnace to smelt iron ore into iron plates using the available coal as fuel.

set_furnace_recipe(Prototype.StoneFurnace, Prototype.IronPlate)  # Set the recipe to smelt iron ore into iron plates
add_fuel(Prototype.StoneFurnace, quantity=10)  # Add 10 coal as fuel

# Now let's check the status of the Stone Furnace to ensure it is operating correctly.
furnace_status = get_furnace_status(Prototype.StoneFurnace)
print(f"Stone Furnace status: {furnace_status}") 

# Additionally, I will check my inventory again to see how many iron plates I have after the smelting process begins.
print(f"Inventory after setting up the furnace: {inspect_inventory()}")
